title: Sony's PC Gaming Earbuds Get Biggest Discount Yet For Black Friday
Save $40 On EA Sports College Football 25, Madden 25, And More Sports Sims

description:
Call of Duty's competitive Ranked Play arrived to Black Ops 6 multiplayer earlier this week, and the mode is already plagued with cheaters. Activision has now addressed the frustration of the playerbase in regards to all the hackers in Ranked Play, and fixes are in the works to improve the game's anti-cheat.

#BlackOps6 #Warzone #RankedPlay#TeamR
title: Activision Addresses Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6's Ranked Play Cheaters

description:
Those who have been playing Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl on Xbox have been experiencing some strange issues on their controllers, but the developer is working on a fix right now.

According to Windows Central, Stalker 2 sets the controller's gamepad deadzones to zero on Xbox. As a result, this means that even the slightest nudge on the controller's stick will move the player while being in the game.

Developer GSC World has confirmed that it is already working on the issue, but there's no announced timeline on when an update will arrive. Stalker 2 is littered with technical
title: A Fix Is Coming For Stalker 2's Weird Xbox Controller Issue

description:
Xbox Wireless Controllers are on sale for awesome prices for Black Friday 2024. Retailers such as Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy are offering steep discounts on a wide variety of colors, including the recently released Ghost Cipher and Sky Cipher Special Editions, which have retro-inspired transparent designs and are on sale for $20 off. Amazon also has an awesome Xbox controller bundle deal.

We've rounded up the best Bl
title: Official Xbox Wireless Controllers On Sale For Up To $25 Off For Black Friday

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 launched with two brand-new Zombies maps, but a third map is arriving with a midseason update. Treyarch has now revealed the upcoming Citadelle des Morts map releases in less than two weeks. Here is everything we know so far about the latest Zombies map.

The Season 1 roadmap confirmed that Citadelle des Morts would arrive sometime midseason, and now a recent post from Treyarch revealed the map arrives on December 5. Activision hasn't confirmed a date for Call of Duty's midseason "Reloaded" update, but it's possible this map will arrive with the rest of Season 1's content for Black Ops 6 and Warzone.
title: CoD: Black Ops 6 Zombies Release Date Revealed For Citadelle Des Morts Map

description:
According to a new report, Microsoft has created a "new committee" in its Activision division that will make key decisions about the future of the Call of Duty brand. According to TheGhostOfHope, who has accurately reported on unannounced Call of Duty developments in the past, Microsoft's new committee will listen to suggestions from Call of Duty studios like Treyarch and Infinity Ward, but ultimately the committee will decide "features" and "systems" to come in future games.

Hope went on to say whether or not a feature like Omnimovement continues beyond Black Ops 6 will be decided by committee, not by any one studio. The insider went on to say a Call of Duty developers are being told "not to innovate" in "UI, Prestige, and certain gameplay features." Instead, studios are being asked to come up with new directions for things like "maps, mode
title: Call Of Duty's Future Design Plans Emerge In Leaked Information

description: Fanatical's Black Friday Sale is now live, offering huge discounts on hundreds of PC games. The vast majority of these are sold as Steam keys, and spending over $12 gets you a random bonus such as a free game or discount coupon. You'll also want to check back daily to see what new flash deals are live, as these are among the best price cuts of Black Friday. At the time of writing, notable flash deals include Starfield for $36 (was $70) and
title: Tons Of Popular PC Games Are Discounted For Black Friday

description: Best Buy's Black Friday Doorbuster deal on HP's 15.6-inch Victus Gaming Laptop is back. You can get this $800 entry-level gaming laptop for only $430. Initially offered as an early Black Friday deal a couple weeks ago, Best Buy's stock vanished pretty fast (unsurprisingly). If you're interested in picking up an entry-level gaming laptop as a gift this holiday, it'll be challenging to find one for this low of a price. The HP Victus is one of several enticing Doorbuster deals at Best Buy. We've included a list of others at the end of this article.
title: Black Friday Doorbuster: Best Buy Restocks $430 HP Victus Gaming Laptop Deal

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 launched into Xbox Game Pass, and many questioned how that decision might affect the game's sales. Now, that picture is coming into focus, albeit only somewhat.

Circana analyst Mat Piscatella shared some key datapoints today that speak to the effect of Black Ops 6 launching on Game Pass in the US. He said it led to a "subscription spending boost," as people opted to buy a Game Pass subscription instead of purchasing the game outright. Before this, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella said Black Ops 6's launch on Game Pass drove the biggest single-day sign-ups for a new Game Pass launch of all time.

Piscatella added that Microsoft's decision to launch Black Ops 6 on Game Pass "shifted" the share of full-game sales to PlayStation. While Black Op
title: How Black Ops 6 Launching On Game Pass Helped PlayStation

description: The top-selling games in the US for the month of October have been revealed by market research firm Circana--via executive director Mat Piscatella on Bluesky--and surprisingly, it's packed with new releases. The #1 spot isn't shocking; after all, Black Ops 6 had a record-setting debut, with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella saying that the shooter's release on October 25 set a new record for new Game Pass subscriber additions on launch day, while sales on PlayStation and Steam were up "over 60% year-over-year" compared to Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III (2023).
title: New Releases Dominate The 20 Best-Selling Games For October In The US

description:

It doesn’t sound like much, but since these official covers rarely go on sale, this is a great time to bring some color to your console.

Be sure to double-check your cover before making a purchase, as these are designed for specific PS5 models. For example, some will only work with PS
title: Official PS5 Console Covers Are Discounted For Black Friday

description:
Amazon recently launched an updated lineup of its popular Kindle ereaders, and for Black Friday many of these are now seeing generous price cuts. The brand-new Kindle Colorsoft is still full price, but now is a great time to pick up the revised Kindle Paperwhite or Kindle, as they’re both down to their lowest price ever. A trade-in offer is also available, which gets you 20% off select Kindles when trading in your old device.

The Kindle Paperwhite (16GB) is on sale for $130
title: All-New Kindles Hit Their Lowest Prices Of The Year For Black Friday
Armored Core 6 And The Official Hardcover Guidebook Are Cheap For Black Friday

description:
Following the recent conclusion of the 2024 Major League Baseball season, Sony's San Diego Studio has given fans their first look at what's in store for MLB The Show 25, confirming straight off the bat that the unpopular Sets and Seasons feature will not be returning.

Sets and Seasons appears to be retiring even before MLB 25 debuts, with the developer announcing that you'll be able to use any card you want in Season 4 of MLB The Show 24, including cards that are in your inventory from a previous season.
title: First MLB The Show 25 Details Revealed, Sets And Seasons To Be Retired

description:
Strange Scaffold released its follow-up to El Paso Elsewhere , I Am Your Beast, back in September. It launched with a short-but-sweet campaign, but with the debut of a new free update today, it now has nine additional levels for players to check out.

The new additions are part of the Support Group pack that serves as an epilogue to the game's story. I Am Your Beast puts players in control of Alphonse Harding, an ex-secret agent who is sick and tired of being called back in to do one more job. When Harding finally turns down his former employers at the Cover Operations Initiative, the agency sends multiple operatives to kill him.

According to Strange Scaffold, the epilogue will feature traumatized Cover Operatives Imitative agents who
title: One Of The Year's Best Games Just Added Nine More Levels For Free

description:
Wicked has officially hit the big screen, and it’s pulling in stellar reviews from both critics and viewers alike. And if you’re excited to get it into your home theater, the Wicked: Limited Edition Gift Set is up for preorder at Amazon. You’ll also find an exclusive steelbook and standard 4K Blu-ray available for preorder--ensuring you have a copy of the hit film as soon as possible.

Wicked: Limited Edition Gift Set

$240

description:
SpongeBob SquarePants: A Patrick Star Game launched in October, and if you're looking to score a deal on the game based on the popular Nickelodeon TV series, you're in luck. For Black Friday, Best Buy is selling its Switch-exclusive Steelbook edition for only $35. It normally sells for $50.

The Steelbook itself is covered from top to bottom with Patrick's smiling face. If you're a big fan of Patrick Star, this might be the perfect item to go on your mantle to display proudly.
title: SpongeBob: A Patrick Star Game's Steelbook Edition Is On Sale For A Good Price Right Now
PS5 Slim Fortnite Holiday Bundles Launch With Black Friday Prices

description:
This weekend, Arcane Season 2 is wrapping up the show with a grand finale. But the League of Legends-inspired series apparently caused some friction between Riot Games and Netflix over an Arcane Season 2 promo poster that was created by AI.

A user on X going by eggbertith noticed the image and posted it online. The dead giveaway that it was AI-created is the anatomically incorrect hand, which is an area where AI imagery still struggles.

i feel stupid but what is going on with jinx's (vi's??) hand?? pic.twitter.com/sdPQ2Cl10e

— egg 🔥 arcane s2 spoilers (@eggbertith) <
title: Riot Calls Out Netflix For "Disrespectful" AI-Made Arcane Season 2 Poster

description: Most of us will never own one of the coolest cars of all time--the 1961 Chevrolet Corvette C1--but this Lego replica of the iconic vehicle is a nice consolation prize. On sale for Black Friday, you can pick up this stylish recreation of the Corvette C1 for just $105 (was $150).
title: Take The Lego Corvette C1 For A Spin In This Black Friday Deal

description:
Looking for a cool way to update your PC gaming space this Black Friday? Then look no further than these wild Lord of the Rings keyboards. Designed by Drop, four unique TKL mechanical keyboards are now on sale for $149 each. Typically sold for $200, the current price cuts are among the best we’ve seen all year for the stylish keyboards--some are even down to their lowest prices ever.

Specifications are largely shared across all models, with just the colors and overall design scheme changing between the four. Regardless of which you buy, you’ll benefit from a premium aluminum frame, Drop Holy Panda X switches for a tactile feel, and Drop Phantom stabilizers to quiet all your keystrokes. Toss in N-key rollover, a compact TKL format, and a full row of function buttons, and you’ve got a gr
title: These Stylish Lord Of The Rings Keyboards Are Discounted For Black Friday

description:
Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl launched on November 20 after years of development, and it seems to be off to a solid start. Developer GSC Game World announced that the first-person survival game has cleared 1 million copies sold across PC and Xbox, but that doesn't tell the entire story of how many people have played it.

In its statement, GSC said that in addition to the 1 million sales, "much more stalkers" have joined in thanks to Game Pass. The studio did not specify how many people are playing on Game Pass, however.

There is an ongoing discussion about whether or not releasing on Game Pass at launch negatively impacts sales. There are no definitive answers, and every game is d
title: Day-One Game Pass Launch Stalker 2 Crosses Major Sales Milestone

description:
We're living in a golden age of new Dragon Ball games, and if you're looking to score a Black Friday discount on a recent release, you're in luck, as Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero is just $50 currently. Normally priced at $70, Sparking Zero is the newest chapter in the venerable Tenkaichi Budokai series, a line of Dragon Ball games that has been dormant for quite a few years.

  • Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero (PS5) -- $50 ($70)
  • Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero (Xbox Series X) -- $50 ($70)

The long wait between releases has paid off, as Sparking Zero is a fast and furious brawler that looks amazing in action. For Dragon Ball fans, it's a game
title: Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero Gets Its First Big Discount For Black Friday

description: This year marks the 25th anniversary of Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menace, and for Black Friday, you can grab a Lego set based on an exciting scene from the film for a low price. Normally $80, the Mos Espa pod-racing Lego diorama is on sale for $56 at Best Buy, and it makes for a lovely showpiece when fully constructed.
title: Get This Cool Lego Star Wars Podracing Set For Cheap During Black Friday

description:
There have been some unique throwback games over the years, but SpreadCheat looks like it's going to be in a category all of its own. Games People Play and Rubarb are developing the upcoming puzzle title, which invites the player to use an Excel-like program to commit a little financial fraud in the name of hitting your company's fiscal targets.

Although Games People Play describes SpreadCheat as capturing "a retro Windows 3.11 setting," the actual character models and backgrounds look like mid-'80s computer graphics. The player's character is a recently hired employee who has to cook the books, so to speak. Essentially, players have to create and manipulate spreadsheet data so it looks like the company is hitting its financial goals. In the real world, this would all be wildly illegal. But in the context of the game, it's played for laughs. One thing we're not clear about is whether the player can be caught and punished for their financial malfeasance by the authorities.
title: Committing Fraud Is The Name Of The Game In SpreadCheat, A Love Letter To Excel

description:
Nintendo continues to mine(cart) developer Rare's back catalog for Switch Online, as Donkey Kong Land is the latest addition to the subscription service. The Game Boy game--which originally launched in 1995--is now available on Switch Online.

Coming out a year after Donkey Kong Country on SNES, Donkey Kong Land saw Rare trying to bring the same sort of side-scrolling experience to the less-powerful Game Boy. This handheld title even features a familiar soundtrack, which can be heard in the video below.

Donkey Kong Land is the first Game Boy title featuring Nintendo's lovable ape. Another classic for that platform is Donk
title: Donkey Kong Land Is Out Now On Nintendo Switch Online, But Not Donkey Kong 64

description:
Top sellers


Circana, the research group formerly known as NPD, has published its latest monthly US sales report, providing an updated look at the best-selling games of 2024 thus far. With the October report, nothing changes at the top, with EA Sports College Football 25 remaining No. 1.

CFB 25 was the first new entry in EA's series in 10 years, dating back to NCAA Football 14 in 2013. It continues to perform well following its launch in July. EA's pro football game, Madden, is also performing well, landing at No. 6 overall for 2024 so far.

Activision's Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the biggest new release for October, and after just a few days on sale, it reached No. 3 for 2024 so far. The game is also available on Game Pass, which no doubt impacted physical game sales.

PS4 and PS5 game sales for Black Ops 6 made up
title: 2024's Best-Selling Games In The US So Far

description: A bunch of PlayStation Studios games are on sale for Black Friday, but if you're looking for one that has the heart and charm of an old-school platformer, Astro Bot is an easy recommendation. It's on sale for the first time at multiple retailers, including Amazon and Best Buy. Normally $60, Astro Bot is up for grabs for $50 for a limited time.
title: Astro Bot Gets First Discount For Black Friday

description:
Blizzard is holding another PTR (Public Test Realm) for Diablo 4, testing some of the new features and content that will be arriving in Season 7 next year. Here's everything Diablo 4 players on PC will be able to preview during the 2.1 update test period, which will run December 3-10.

One of the major new features previewed in the 2.1 PTR is the Armory, a new feature that will allow players to swap between different builds easily. The Armory lets you save, load, and name your favorite character builds, with five different built slots allotted per character. Loadouts will save a character's equipped items, Paragon Board and Glyphs, skill selections, and class mechanic. Switching between them will display the relevant details at a glance.
title: Everything New In Diablo 4's 2.1 PTR Update

description:
Star Wars Outlaws is starting a new chapter this week with the launch of the game's first story DLC, Wild Card. To mark the occasion, Ubisoft has dropped a launch trailer that explains how Kay Vess and her friends get drawn into an adventure alongside the legendary Lando Calrissian. But it looks like they'll be on opposite sides at the start.

An outlaw's reputation means everything in the underworld, which is how the Empire is able to successfully blackmail Kay into working for them on this mission. If she refuses, the Empire will simply let it be known t
title: Lando's Back In Star Wars Outlaw: Wild Card Launch Trailer

description:
Rockstar's Grand Theft Auto VI took home the "Most Wanted Game" award at the Golden Joysticks this week, and in an acceptance speech, a developer teased "absolutely mind-blowing things" to come from the game.

"There's an incredible amount of people doing amazing things on Grand Theft Auto 6. Absolutely mind-blowing things so it's a real honor to be able to come up here and accept this award on everyone's behalf," the developer said (via Rockstar Intel).
title: GTA 6 Dev Teases "Mind-Blowing Things"
DualSense PS5 Controllers Get First Major Discounts Of 2024 For Black Friday

description:
The Last of Us is one of Sony's biggest first-party franchises, and for Black Friday, you can grab remasters of both chapters for cheap at Amazon. The PS5 version of The Last of Us Part 1 is discounted to $30 (was $70) and Part 2 is on sale for $40 (was $50). These deals are available at multiple retailers, including Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy--so if one retailer sells out, be sure to check the other to see if the games are still available. If you pick up both games, you 're saving $50 overall, which matches the best price yet for the series on PlayStation 5.

title: Save $50 On The Last Of Us PS5 Games With These Black Friday Deals
